PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_LightFixtureTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Common data for light fixtures.\X\0D History: IFC4 - Article number and manufacturer specific information deleted. Use Pset_ManufacturerTypeInformation. ArticleNumber instead. Load properties moved from Pset_LightFixtureTypeThermal (deleted).

PropertyDef.Name: LightFixtureMountingType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of mounting for light fixtures from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: LightFixturePlacingType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of placing specification for light fixtures from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: MaintenanceFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: The arithmetical allowance made for depreciation of lamps and reflective equipment from their initial values due to dirt, fumes, or age.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumPlenumSensibleLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum or Peak sensible thermal load contributed to return air plenum by the light fixture.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumSpaceSensibleLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum or Peak sensible thermal load contributed to the conditioned space by the light fixture.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), provided, if there is no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.

PropertyDef.Name: SensibleLoadToRadiant
PropertyDef.Definition: Percent of sensible thermal load to radiant heat.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: TotalWattage
PropertyDef.Definition: Wattage on whole lightfitting device with all sources intact.
